raw_infobox.name: John Stockton
raw_infobox.caption: Stockton in 2022
raw_infobox.cyears1: 2015–16 NCAA Division I women's basketball season
raw_infobox.highlights:
* 10× NBA All-Star (1989–1997, 2000)
* NBA All-Star Game Most Valuable Player Award{{efn|along with Karl Malone}} (1993)
* 2× All-NBA First Team (1993, 1994)
* 6× All-NBA Second Team (1987–1989, 1991, 1992, 1995)
* 3x All-NBA Third Team (1990, 1996, 1998)
* 5× NBA All-Defensive Second Team (1988, 1990, 1991, 1994, 1996)
* 9× List of National Basketball Association annual assists leaders (1987–1995)
* 2× List of National Basketball Association annual steals leaders (1988, 1991)
* NBA anniversary team (50 Greatest Players in NBA History, NBA 75th Anniversary Team)
* No. 12 Utah Jazz#Retired numbers
* West Coast Conference Men's Basketball Player of the Year (1984)
* 2× First-team All-West Coast Conference (1983, 1984)
* No. 12 Gonzaga Bulldogs men's basketball#Retired numbers
